text: Haqeeqat yeh hai ke tumahra Rubb wahi khuda hai jisne aasmano aur zameen ko chey (six) dino mein paida kiya, phir takht e hukumat par jalwa-gar hua aur qayinat ka intezaam chala raha hai. Koi shafaat (sifarish) karne wala nahin illa yeh ke iski ijazat ke baad shafaat karey. Yahi Allah tumhara Rubb hai lihaza tum usi ki ibadat karo. Phir kya tum hosh mein na aaogey
